#summary ReleaseNotes 0.6.1

New Features:

 * iRODS
   * Shib authentication
 * Supports default IdP name, if only a slash presents

Upgrade from 0.5.x:

 * use jargon 2.0.3 
 * replace $JETTY_HOME/webapps/root/WEB-INF/lib/davis.jar
 * replace $JETTY_HOME/webapps/root/WEB-INF/web.xml and modify it accordingly

Upgrade from 0.6.0:

 * replace $JETTY_HOME/webapps/root/WEB-INF/lib/davis.jar
 * replace $JETTY_HOME/webapps/root/WEB-INF/web.xml and modify it accordingly
